item.title: Biden chooses Delaware for presidential library, picks board to raise funds
item.description: The exact site for the center has not been chosen, but the 46th president has a close affiliation with the University of Delaware.

item.title: The Republican economist who says Trump is wrong about almost everything
item.description: A top adviser for George W. Bush, John McCain and congressional GOP leaders gives his thoughts on where the conservative project went awry.

item.title: West Point alumni group cancels award ceremony for Tom Hanks
item.description: The decision follows a series of political controversies involving the Trump administration that have rattled the prestigious military institution.

item.title: MAGA has a new cautionary tale: England
item.description: Anti-Muslim rhetoric was prominent at a conference where Trump administration allies called Britain the “canary in the coal mine” for problems they at...

item.title: Why is Trump intervening in the New York City mayor’s race?
item.description: The president has made no secret of his dislike of Zohran Mamdani, the leader in a crowded field that includes Andrew Cuomo and incumbent Eric Adams.
